subject: Football
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: When the Cardinals meet the Eagles on Sunday, many eyes will be on Arizona’s Larry Fitzgerald who dazzled fans and foes with 14 receptions for 267 yards and 2 touchdowns in the postseason.
snippet: When the Cardinals meet the Eagles on Sunday, many eyes will be on Arizona’s Larry Fitzgerald who dazzled fans and foes with 14 receptions for 267 yards and 2 touchdowns in the postseason.
